content: Dai un pesce a un uomo e lo nutrirai per un giorno. Insegnagli a pescare e lo nutrirai per tutta la vita.
translations: eng:Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for the rest of his life
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
